body_html: Note that CPU tests do a lot more checks than CUDA. _cuda tests are pretty much like run CPU, run GPU, run CPU grad, run GPU grad, compare everything, done. So if CUDA test passes it means that CPU and GPU give consistent outputs
body_text: Note that CPU tests do a lot more checks than CUDA. _cuda tests are pretty much like run CPU, run GPU, run CPU grad, run GPU grad, compare everything, done. So if CUDA test passes it means that CPU and GPU give consistent outputs
body: Note that CPU tests do a lot more checks than CUDA. `_cuda` tests are pretty much like run CPU, run GPU, run CPU grad, run GPU grad, compare everything, done. So if CUDA test passes it means that CPU and GPU give consistent outputs
